titles.title: CB 205 I will build my church

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
I will build my Church
I will build my Church
And the gates of hell
And the gates of hell
Shall not prevail against it

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tis a glorious Church
Without spot or wrinkle
Washed in the blood of the Lamb
Tis a glorious Church
Without spot or wrinkle
Washed in the blood of the Lamb
